content.rendered:
2021 America’s Cup Race Viewing

One of the highlights of each America’s Cup is the stunning location that acts as host and the 2021 edition will be no exception. This prestigious race will take place in Auckland’s gorgeous Waitemata Harbour, dubbed “the jewel in Auckland’s crown.” Hobson’s Wharf and Wynyard Point will be the hub of the excitement next March. Here you’ll find the America’s Cup Village, as well as all the team bases and pit row. There will be plenty of entertainment as well, including concerts and a number of other race-related activities and vendors. America’s Cup fans will be able to enjoy all the action on land and still enjoy the race, which will be visible from America’s Cup Village. A number of viewing areas will be set up so fans can stake out a spot to catch the races.
